entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Morrisburg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:03 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Freezing rain or rain. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets and snow beginning near noon then changing to rain this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early this afternoon. High zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Temperature rising to 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to plus 2 in the morning then steady. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early in the afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 2 in the morning then steady. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. High plus 2.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain or snow. High plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
